trans-unit.source: Retrieves the color for a given portion of a month calendar control

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the color for a given portion of a month calendar control

target.mrk: Retrieves the color for a given portion of a month calendar control

trans-unit.source: Value of type int specifying which month calendar color to retrieve

seg-source.mrk: Value of type int specifying which month calendar color to retrieve

target.mrk: Value of type int specifying which month calendar color to retrieve

trans-unit.source: This value can be one of the following:

seg-source.mrk: This value can be one of the following:

target.mrk: This value can be one of the following:

trans-unit.source: $MCSC_BACKGROUND - Retrieve the background color displayed between months.

seg-source.mrk: $MCSC_BACKGROUND - Retrieve the background color displayed between months.

target.mrk: $MCSC_BACKGROUND - Retrieve the background color displayed between months.

trans-unit.source: $MCSC_MONTHBK - Retrieve the background color displayed within the month.

seg-source.mrk: $MCSC_MONTHBK - Retrieve the background color displayed within the month.

target.mrk: $MCSC_MONTHBK - Retrieve the background color displayed within the month.

trans-unit.source: $MCSC_TEXT - Retrieve the color used to display text within a month.

seg-source.mrk: $MCSC_TEXT - Retrieve the color used to display text within a month.

target.mrk: $MCSC_TEXT - Retrieve the color used to display text within a month.

trans-unit.source: $MCSC_TITLEBK - Retrieve the background color displayed in the calendar's title.

seg-source.mrk: $MCSC_TITLEBK - Retrieve the background color displayed in the calendar's title.

target.mrk: $MCSC_TITLEBK - Retrieve the background color displayed in the calendar's title.

trans-unit.source: $MCSC_TITLETEXT - Retrieve the color used to display text within the calendar's title.

seg-source.mrk: $MCSC_TITLETEXT - Retrieve the color used to display text within the calendar's title.

target.mrk: $MCSC_TITLETEXT - Retrieve the color used to display text within the calendar's title.

trans-unit.source: $MCSC_TRAILINGTEXT - Retrieve the color used to display header day and trailing day text.

seg-source.mrk: $MCSC_TRAILINGTEXT - Retrieve the color used to display header day and trailing day text.

target.mrk: $MCSC_TRAILINGTEXT - Retrieve the color used to display header day and trailing day text.

trans-unit.source: an array in the following format:

seg-source.mrk: an array in the following format:

target.mrk: an array in the following format:

trans-unit.source: Header and trailing days are the days from the previous and following months that appear on the current month calendar.

seg-source.mrk: Header and trailing days are the days from the previous and following months that appear on the current month calendar.

target.mrk: Header and trailing days are the days from the previous and following months that appear on the current month calendar.
